locations.name: Ald'ruhn
locations.description: A town to the southwest of Red Mountain, dominated by House Redoran.

locations.name: Balmora
locations.description: A large town in the West Gash, and Hlaalu council seat.

locations.name: Sadrith Mora
locations.description: A large city at the eastern periphery of Zafirbel Bay, and Telvanni Council seat.

locations.name: Vivec
locations.description:
The largest city in Vvardenfell, off the southern coast of the island.

Foreign Quarter: This canton houses non-Dunmer citizens, their shops and the Imperial Guilds.
Hlaalu Canton: This canton is occupied by Great House Hlaalu.
Redoran Canton: This canton is occupied by Great House Redoran.
Telvanni Canton: This canton is occupied by Great House Telvanni.
Arena Canton: This is where duels to the death between honorable competitors take place.
St. Olms Canton: The St. Olms canton offers low-cost housing and shop space to deserving merchants.
St. Delyn Canton: This canton is owned by the Dunmer Temple, and offers low-cost housing to deserving members.
Temple Canton: Also known as the High Fane, the Temple Canton is the largest Dunmer temple in Vvardenfell.
The Ministry of Truth: This gigantic floating rock is riddled with tunnels and serves as a base and 're-education center' for the secretive Ordinators.
Palace Canton: This is the home of the living god Vivec and site of the Puzzle Canal.

locations.name: Ald Velothi
locations.description: A tiny Redoran outpost north of Gnisis.

locations.name: Caldera
locations.description: A small Imperial mining town in the West Gash.

locations.name: Dagon Fel
locations.description: A tiny Imperial fishing village in the far north, populated almost entirely by Nords.

locations.name: Gnaar Mok
locations.description: A Hlaalu fishing village on the Bitter Coast.

locations.name: Gnisis
locations.description: A small Imperial eggmine town with a notable bazaar and a cranky Telvanni wizard.

locations.name: Hla Oad
locations.description: A tiny fishing village and smuggler's stop-off on the Bitter Coast.

locations.name: Khuul
locations.description: A small fishing village and Redoran trading post on Vvardenfell's northwest shore.

locations.name: Maar Gan
locations.description: A small Redoran outpost and pilgrimage destination.

locations.name: Molag Mar
locations.description: A single-canton floating town built for pilgrims by the Temple.

locations.name: Pelagiad
locations.description: A former retirement community northwest of Vivec.

locations.name: Seyda Neen
locations.description: A small Imperial trading post in the southern Bitter Coast, and the port where the game is begun.

locations.name: Suran
locations.description: A medium-sized Hlaalu city northeast of Vivec.

locations.name: Tel Aruhn
locations.description: The Telvanni tower town of Archmagister Gothren.

locations.name: Tel Branora
locations.description: The Telvanni tower town of Mistress Therana.

locations.name: Tel Fyr
locations.description: The isolated home of Divayth Fyr, and site of the Corprusarium.

locations.name: Tel Mora
locations.description: The Telvanni tower town of Telvanni Councilor Mistress Dratha

locations.name: Tel Vos
locations.description: A Telvanni tower and home of Master Aryon.

locations.name: Vos
locations.description: An ancient Velothi farming village on the eastern coast of Vvardenfell.

locations.name: Indarys Manor
locations.description: A Redoran stronghold located on the site of Bal Isra, near Ald'ruhn and Maar Gan.

locations.name: Rethan Manor
locations.description: A Hlaalu stronghold located on the Odai Plateau, southwest of Balmora.

locations.name: Tel Uvirith
locations.description: A Telvanni settlement in the Molag Amur region, located on the site of Uvirith's Grave.

locations.name: Buckmoth Legion Fort
locations.description: An Imperial Legion Fort located near Ald'ruhn.

locations.name: Ebonheart
locations.description: A large Imperial city to the west of Vivec.

locations.name: Moonmoth Legion Fort
locations.description: An Imperial Legion Fort located near Balmora.

locations.name: Wolverine Hall
locations.description: An Imperial Fort near Sadrith Mora.

locations.name: Ahemmusa Camp
locations.description: The campsite of the Ahemmusa Ashlander clan.

locations.name: Erabenimsun Camp
locations.description: The campsite of the Erabenimsun Ashlander clan.

locations.name: Urshilaku Camp
locations.description: The campsite of the Urshilaku Ashlander clan.

locations.name: Zainab Camp
locations.description: The campsite of the Zainab Ashlander clan.

locations.name: Aharasaplit Camp
locations.description: An Ashlander camp on the southern shoreline of the island of Sheogorad, located southwest of Dagon Fel and northwest of Rotheran.

locations.name: Aidanat Camp
locations.description: A small Ashlander camp just south of Ald Velothi.

locations.name: Ashamanu Camp
locations.description: An outcast Ashlander camp on an island west of Tel Aruhn.

locations.name: Bensiberib Camp
locations.description: A small Ashlander camp located on the mainland of Azura's Coast between Tel Fyr and Tel Uvirith.

locations.name: Elanius Camp
locations.description: Located in the Grazelands Region, not far northeast from Falensarano.

locations.name: Kaushtababi Camp
locations.description: A small Ashlander camp south of Molag Mar, just over the mountains.

locations.name: Mamshar-Disamus Camp
locations.description: An isolated Ashlander camp located just east of the ruins of Kogoruhn.

locations.name: Massahanud Camp
locations.description: The home of a small group of Ashlanders southwest of the Dunmer stronghold Indoranyon.

locations.name: Mila-Nipal
locations.description: A simple yurt northeast of the Daedric shrine Dushariran and east of Salothan Ancestral Tomb.

locations.name: Salit Camp
locations.description: A medium-sized outcast Ashlander settlement southwest of Tel Mora.

locations.name: Shashmanu Camp
locations.description: A desolate camp east of Ald Velothi and south of Khuul.

locations.name: Shashurari Camp
locations.description: A tiny outcast Ashlander settlement west of Erabenimsun Camp.

locations.name: Sobitbael Camp
locations.description: A yurt on Azura's Coast, north of Erabenimsun Camp.

locations.name: Yakaridan Camp
locations.description: A yurt south of Tel Vos.

locations.name: Tel Naga
locations.description: The mushroom wizard tower of Master Neloth in Sadrith Mora.
